room.roomFeature: The floor is covered with humanoid bones, and a rusted breastplate lies in the east side of the room
A chute descends from the room into a midden chamber below, and a faded and torn tapestry hangs from the north wall
A tapestry of ghoulish carnage hangs from the south wall, and a bent dagger lies in the north side of the room
A stone ramp ascends towards the north wall, and the north and west walls have been engraved with glowing glyphs
A stair ascends to a wooden platform in the east side of the room, and the scent of urine fills the south-east corner of the room
A narrow shaft descends from the room into a midden chamber below, and a faded and torn tapestry hangs from the east wall
A tile labyrinth covers the floor, and a rotting journal lies in the north-east corner of the room
A fountain of water sits against the east wall, and a pile of broken arrows lies in the south-west corner of the room
Someone has scrawled 'You cannot kill it with swords' on the west wall, and sporadic knocking can be heard in the south side of the room
A shallow pit lies in the north side of the room, and a tapping sound can be faintly heard near the north wall
Someone has scrawled 'This paladin is dead' in draconic script on the east wall, and a sulphurous odor fills the room
